Package sru.edu.group1.workorders.controller

Class ForgotPasswordController

java.lang.Object
sru.edu.group1.workorders.controller.ForgotPasswordController
@Controller public class ForgotPasswordController extends Object
This is the controller which will be called whenever a user forgets their password on the login page
Author:
Trevor Bell trevorbell030@gmail.com, Ellie Wurst, John Friend, Hunter Minteer
